text: The Jewett Trophy is a Canadian sports trophy, in honour of Dr. B. L. Jewett, presented annually to the winner of the Atlantic University Sport Football Conference of U Sports. Unlike the other three conference championship games, the game in which this trophy is awarded is not named for the trophy itself; it is known as the Loney Bowl. The winner of the Jewett Trophy goes on to play in either the Uteck Bowl or the Mitchell Bowl, depending on annual rotations. Note that prior to 1973, the championship was awarded to the first place team during the regular season. ==Winners== *1960 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *1961 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *1962 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *1963 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *1964 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1965 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1966 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *1967 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *1968 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1969 - UNB Red Bombers *1970 - UNB Red Bombers *1971 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1972 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1973 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1974 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1975 - Acadia Axemen *1976 - Acadia Axemen *1977 - Acadia Axemen *1978 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *1979 - Acadia Axemen *1980 - Acadia Axemen *1981 - Acadia Axemen *1982 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *1983 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *1984 - Mount Allison Mounties *1985 - Mount Allison Mounties *1986 - Acadia Axemen *1987 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1988 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1989 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1990 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1991 - Mount Allison Mounties *1992 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1993 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1994 - Saint Mary's Huskies *1995 - Acadia Axemen *1996 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *1997 - Mount Allison Mounties *1998 - Acadia Axemen *1999 - Saint Mary's Huskies *2000 - Saint Mary's Huskies *2001 - Saint Mary's Huskies *2002 - Saint Mary's Huskies *2003 - Saint Mary's Huskies *2004 - Saint Mary's Huskies *2005 - Acadia Axemen *2006 - Acadia Axemen *2007 - Saint Mary's Huskies *2008 - Saint Mary's Huskies *2009 - Saint Mary's Huskies *2010 - Saint Mary's Huskies *2011 - Acadia Axemen *2012 - Acadia Axemen *2013 - Mount Allison Mounties *2014 - Mount Allison Mounties *2015 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *2016 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *2017 - Acadia Axemen *2018 - St. Francis Xavier X-Men *2019 - Acadia Axemen ==Detailed scores== {| class="wikitable" !Date !Champion !Score !Runner Up !Score !Location !Maury L.
